description: MCP server configuration for Claude Code - copy to ~/.claude/

basic-memory.description: Persistent memory with markdown notes and knowledge graph

lancedb.description: Embedded vector database for semantic search - no server required

notes.lancedb: Embedded vector DB stored at memory/vectors/lancedb. No server required. Install: pip install lancedb-mcp
